title: Blue Whales: Giant Mammals
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,458 words, Level Z (Grade 5), Lexile 1110L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     H and R
description: Blue Whales: Giant Mammals allows students to learn about the largest animals on Earth. From their anatomy to their offspring, blue whales have many interesting things for students to learn about. Photographs, maps, and diagrams support the text.
